subject: Football
Relocation of Business
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: As fans clung to hope that the Raiders would not relocate to Los Angeles for a second time, the team earned a 23-20 overtime win over the Chargers in its 2015 home finale.
snippet: As fans clung to hope that the Raiders would not relocate to Los Angeles for a second time, the team earned a 23-20 overtime win over the Chargers in its 2015 home finale.
